name: mellowly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is pleasant, relaxed, and soft: The autumn evening was now closing in mellowly all around them. The sound of her voice was sweet and mellowly distinct.
More examplesFewer examplesThe chiming of a church bell floated mellowly through the purple dusk.She emerged tired but happy from her room and he took her mellowly into his arms.The piece has been recorded quite mellowly.The moon shone mellowly across the water.The ruins of the ancient church stood mellowly warm in the late afternoon light.
